code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import userReducer from'./user/user.reducer';import cartReducer from'./cart/cart.reducer';import blogReducer from'./blog-list/blog.reducer';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage,whitelist:['cart','blog']};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,blog:blogReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
